showScoreExcerpt:
“while ‘Gutenberg! The Musical!’ undoubtedly is a piece of fluff, it is delightful fluff nevertheless. What makes it worth the visit is the time we get to spend with Bud and Doug (and Gad and Rannells), not only as they amateurly perform their show, but as they face us directly and talk about their friendship, and about the love and joy and sweat and hopes and pride and fears that are reflected in everything they have done to make this evening happen.”

Read more
